title: Business or Mercantile use wholly or in combination with the residential use in any other zone mentioned in Regulation, other than Regional Park Zone and No Development Zone, shall be as below
clause_text: Business or Mercantile use wholly or in combination with the residential use in any other zone mentioned in Regulation, other than Regional Park Zone and No Development Zone, shall be as below.
section: (#) 10.10.1 Basic FSI Permissible for Certain Categories of Plots.
